unnormalised: Mhaka tichim "404 Not Found" mhuntlear khorench kitem mhuntlear mhaka poilech pavtt kitem koll’llem mhaka ugddas asa. Tem fokot screenacher ek error message nhoi; tem ek free Bollywood song download sodhunk mhaka ek digital addkhallo aasilo. Hem poilim 2000chea dashkantlem, pre-Jio, jen’na internet access sonneak poriant molacho aani local cyber cafeant ghontyak Rs. 200/-, Kanpur mhojea ganvant diunk poddta aslo.
normalised: Mhaka ugddas asa, poilech fautt "four hundred and four Not Found" mhunnje khorench kitem tem mhaka koll'llem. Tem fokot screen-acher dispi ek error message naxil'lem; tem ek digital roadblock aslem, mhaka free Bollywood song download korunk zai aslem te sodpant. Hea vellar don hazarachye survatek Jio naslem, internet access sonneakui chodd molacho aslo ani tachek rupia don xembhor vorak diunk podtale, Kanpur-antlea lagchea cyber cafe-nt.

unnormalised: Mhojea klasichea bhurgeanche koddlean mhaka aikunk mell’llem ki ek gazal zaite Hindi filmachim gitanim bhorlolem website asa. Tem tonddantlean aani notebookachea fattchem panacher boroilelem: www.bollytunes.com/songs. Of course, tea vellar, mhaka URLs vo typos sodhunche importance kitea mhuntlear mhaka kollonaslem. Mhojea pocket poche duddvanim bhortun, mhaka skool suttlea uprant hanv cyber cafeak vetam.
normalised: Mhaka mhojea class-mitranchi fucfuc aikunk mell'li ti sangtale ki ek gazalkhajik website asa jim sangta ki tanche kodden soglle nove Hindi filmachim gitan asat. Tem tonddantlean vanttun ghetlem, notebookachea fatrakhat xerantlelem: w-w-w dot bollytunes dot com slash songs. Of course, tedna mhaka U-R-Ls kitem te kolle na vo typos check korpachem mahatvui kolle na. Mhoje pocket-iche poixe gheun, humedicher, mhaka skul sornnachyea uprant cyber cafe-nt bhaglem.

unnormalised: Kanpantlea botamni address type korun, hanv enter marlem, ek musical paradise melltolem mhunn hanv apeksha kartam. Punn tacher mhaka "404 Not Found" mhunn dislem. Hanv portun, portun try kelem, dor pavtt ekach result mell’llem. Cyber cafeacho dhoni, ghott daktto diisuncho monis, taka mhojem nirashponn dislem. "Beta, spelling chukonk na?" Tannem mhaka sallo dilo. "Zait .net asunk xekta, .com nhoi?"
normalised: Kompitat adharan tim asrun, adharachea dolyan, mhaka enter marlem, mhaka sangitacho sorg melltolem mhunn dhorlem. Tache bodlek, tem bhayanak “four hundred and four Not Found” mhaka portun dislem. Mhaka porthun praytn kelo, ani porthun, ekach parinamamvangan. Cyber cafe-cho dhoni, ek sovaicho monis ghott chosmeanchea, mhaka nirash dislem. "Beta, spelling check kar," tannem updesh dilo. "Kadechit tem dot net aslem, dot com naxil'lem?"

unnormalised: Hanvem .in, .org, “www.” add korun aani kaddun dor combination try korunk 30 minute karch kele, dor prayatn fail zanvchem. Te Rs. 100 veginuch nas zale, mhaka “dead link” mhuntlear kitem mhunn koll’llem. Aani internet koxem korta mhunn kollonk mhaka khub utsukta asli.
normalised: Mhaka udhrankalache udhegamvangan dot in, dot org, “w-w-w dot” vantun ani kaddun praytn korunk laglem – punn soglle praytn asfol zale. Tim rupia ek xembhor vegim vatten gele, mhaka “dead link” mhunnje kitem te kitlem dukhi dita tem zannam zalam. Ani ek zhuz zhuzunk laglem internet koxem khorench vaporunk zata tem samzon vhorunk zai aslem.

unnormalised: Uprant, mhojea ixttan DNS servers vixim sanghlem, IP addresses koxem kortat, aani hostingachem concept kitem mhunn koll’llem. Mhojem mon uddon gelem. Mhaka koll’llem ki “404” fokot error nhoi; tem web serverachem borekponnacho (vo borekponn naslolo) tariko aasi, “Sorry, tum sodhta tea ‘location’ internetacher mhaka mellonk na.” Tannem mhaka Computer Scienceak degree korunk proerit kelem.
normalised: Uprant, ek mitran mhaka D-N-S servers bhaxen ulayle, koxem I-P addresses khorench vapurtat, ani hosting-achem sokoll kitem tem sangun dilem. Mhaka vichitrailim. Mhaka koll’lem ki "four hundred and four" fokot ek random error naxil’lem; tem web serverachem sovaichem (vo naxil’le sovaichem) rup aslem, "Sorry, mhaka tem sodunk mellonk na jem tum sodtat tea internetacherachem 'thon'acher." Taka lagun mhaka Computer Science-ant degree korunk zai aslem.

unnormalised: Vorsa uprant, TinyURL (tinyurl.com/example) sarkhe service vaprun “URL shortening” sarkhe concepts mhaka koll’lle aani SMS vo emailacher dhaddlolea links vattean "phishing" korun chokounche bhet aasi (jheun '₹1 Crore Lottery!' jitlo - click kor naka!). "Bandwidth" ek dom important visay zata, khas korun IPL matches zalear, sogle Jio connectionacher live stream kartalim. Mhaka “Wi-Fi” vixim mhojea ajeak sanghunk poddlem aani kiteak tika WhatsAppacher 10:00 PM (peak usage time, hanvem sodhun kaddlem) calls drop zaitale.
normalised: Vorsa uprant, mhaka "U-R-L shortening" TinyURL (tinyurl dot com slash example) vaprun ani "phishing" cleverly asrun dhaklolim link S-M-S vo email vantun sorn, "rupee one crore Lottery!' jetle bhaxen - click karunk naka! "Bandwidth" tanak ek critical chinta zalem, khas korun I-P-L matchent soglle Jio connectionsacher live streaming kortale tedna. Mhaka mhoje ailek "Wi-Fi" mhunnje kitem tem samzon diunk podttolem ani kiteak tanche WhatsApp calls dhakle ratchea dha vaztachea P-M-ant (peak usage time, mhaka sodank mell’llem) dhomp poddtai tem sangunk podttolem.

unnormalised: Ugddas kartana, “404” error mhaka internet vixim kollonk khub important step aasi. Kitea khatir ek simplle error message itlo learning journey suru koronk xekta mhunn mhaka hasunk yeta. Tea khatir, tumi portun “404” polletokoch, fakot boreponn naslo mhunn chint naka. Mhojea Kanpur cyber cafeacho experience ugddas kori, aani zait tumchea jivitacher tum kamik sobit vost sodhta. It is important to note that things like "VPN" are used to bypass region restrictions.
normalised: Porthun vichar korunk, tim suruvatichi nirasha “four hundred and four” error mhoje internet samzon vhorunk ek gazalkhajik pavl aslem. Tem kitlench hassanchem ek simple error message kitlench mhottvem shikunk pavunk zata. Tor fuddarak tumi ek “four hundred and four” pollet tor borek chiddunk naka. Mhojea Kanpur cyber cafe-ntlo anubhav ugddas dovrum, vo tum khoinchech noven vhachche rastacher melltolem. Tem mahatvachem ki "V-P-N" koxem region restrictions bhair dortalem.
